sections.heading: Student Loan Assistance Program; established
sections.text: There is hereby established the Nebraska Student Loan Assistance Program to be financed by the authority in the manner provided in the Nebraska Educational, Health, Cultural, and Social Services Finance Authority Act.SourceLaws 1993, LB 465, § 34;R.S.1943

58-863.Nebraska Student Loan Assistance Program; established.

There is hereby established the Nebraska Student Loan Assistance Program to be financed by the authority in the manner provided in the Nebraska Educational, Health, Cultural, and Social Services Finance Authority Act.

SourceLaws 1993, LB 465, § 34;R.S.1943, (1994), § 79-2961;Laws 1995, LB 5, § 60;R.S.1943, (2008), § 85-1760;Laws 2013, LB170, § 63;Laws 2019, LB224, § 37.
